channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET -- ESET NOD32 Antivirus

item.title: CVE-2021-37852|2024-09-16T23:02:00.516Z -- eset -- eset%20nod32%20antivirus
item.description: ESET products for Windows allows untrusted process to impersonate the client of a pipe, which can be leveraged by attacker to escalate privileges in the context of NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM.
